title: Michigan, USA
brief_description: Michigan in the heart of America surrounded by the Great Lakes offers entertainment, relaxation, scenic beauty and history to the visitor. Detroit city, the ultimate in modern civilization and industrialisation; nostalgic Mackinac Island where motor vehicles are prohibited; historic Greenfield Village with its blacksmith; water sports on the numerous lakes, and exciting winter sports are but a few of the attractions.
